Definition_e: An area (also known as 'catchment') having a common outlet for its surface runoff, in km2.
An area or volume of 100 km to 3000 km horizontal extent (for example, fronts, various cyclones, cloud clusters).
An area or volume of 3 km to 100 km horizontal extent (for example, thunderstorms, sea and mountain breezes).
An area or volume less than 100 m horizontal extent (for example, evaporation).
An area or volume of more than 3000 km horizontal extent (for example, long upper tropospheric waves).
An area or volume of 100 m to 3 km horizontal extent (for example, air pollution, tornadoes).
Not applicable in the context of the observed quantity; or: unknown; or: not available.
